title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The student response does not include this criterion.

  • Answer with reason that must include an implicit or explicit connection between the “function model is increasing” and “daily sales are decreasing.”

The student response includes this criterion.

  • Answer with reason that must include an implicit or explicit connection between the “function model is increasing” and “daily sales are decreasing.”
